# MACaptionAppearanceCopyProfileIDs() | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Accessibility ](/documentation/mediaaccessibility)

- [ MACaptionAppearanceCopyProfileIDs() ](/documentation/mediaaccessibility/macaptionappearancecopyprofileids())

-  MACaptionAppearanceCopyProfileIDs() 

Function# MACaptionAppearanceCopyProfileIDs()

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
func MACaptionAppearanceCopyProfileIDs() -> CFArray
```

## [Return Value](/documentation/mediaaccessibility/macaptionappearancecopyprofileids()#return-value)

An array of strings where each string represents a unique caption profile ID.

## [Discussion](/documentation/mediaaccessibility/macaptionappearancecopyprofileids()#discussion)

Copies all system and user defined profiles, each represented by a CFString containing a non-human-readable ID
